title: Navratna Kangan - Geometric Gemstone Bangle Set
features: These stunning bangles feature a contemporary take on the traditional Navratna design. Square-cut gemstones are bezel-set within a sleek, minimalist gold frame, separated by delicate floral-shaped diamond clusters. The high-gloss Hyderabadi polish enhances the richness of the gold and the vibrancy of the gems.
occasions: Ideal for festive occasions like Diwali
or as a cherished gift for a loved one. Its modern aesthetic also makes it suitable for cocktail parties and special events.
description: Experience the fusion of tradition and modernity with these exquisite Navratna bangles. Each gemstone is carefully selected for its quality and color, representing the nine planets in Vedic astrology. Possessing these bangles ensures success, prosperity, and well-being as it embodies astrological benefits and showcases exceptional craftsmanship.
